title: Better Man - SBS TV Show
description:
A four-part dramatization based on the true story of Van Nguyen, a Vietnamese-Australian, widely known as Ã¢â‚¬ËœThe Baby of Death RowÃ¢â‚¬â„¢. Better Man tells the powerful account of a young man desperately trying to provide for his family, for which he paid the ultimate price. 

From the tough but loving upbringing that Van shared with his twin brother and devoted mother, to the gripping and heart-stopping events following his arrest in Singapore having been convicted of drug trafficking and sentenced with the death penalty. This confronting story culminates in an extraordinary three-year legal battle led by Melbourne lawyer, Julian McMahon and Melbourne QC, Lex Lasry to save the young manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life. 
Starring David Wenham, Bryan Brown, Claudia Karvan & Remy Hii



****Please Note this is two 2 hour episodes, not four 1 hour episodes.****
